extendedInfo.description: MeloDroid let's you sync your iTunes music and playlists to your Android device over both wireless and USB, and use it as a wireless remote control for iTunes. MeloDroid can also automatically pause iTunes when you receive a call, and resume when the call ends.The MeloDroid app requires a Windows application to run (which you can download for free at http://melodroid.com ), just like many other apps that sync Android and iTunes. However, MeloDroid is packed with features that sets it apart from the rest. The MeloDroid Windows application includes (but is not limited to) the following features:- Convert your iTunes music to MP3's- Restore playlists you accidentally deleted in iTunes- Find and remove broken tracks in iTunes- Display iTunes song notificationsUnlike DoubleTwist, you do not need to install a separate media player. With its minimalist interface, MeloDroid works with iTunes and runs alongside it, making your overall experience with iTunes much better. It's the perfect iTunes add-on.Full feature list and screenshots of the Windows application at: http://melodroid.comNote: Please report any issues at melodroid.com. You should receive a response within 24 hours.Requirements:iTunesWindows XP/Vista/7Permissions:INTERNET - For communication with the Windows application.READ_PHONE_STATE - To pause iTunes when you receive a call, and resume when the call ends.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE - MeloDroid will check if WiFi is turned on, since it is required for MeloDroid to function.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE - If WiFi isn't enabled, MeloDroid will ask your permission to turn it on.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - This allows MeloDroid to sync with iTunes over wireless; this permission allows MeloDroid to write music to your SD card.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - MeloDroid must read the music from your SD card to delete old songs during QuickSync.GET_ACCOUNTS - This is ONLY used to grab your email address so that mobile devices are identifiable when connecting to MeloDroid on the PC.BILLING - This is simply for buying the full version.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t seem to work well with my Nexus 7 (2013)
reviews.comment: I purchased this app to sync my podcasts to my nexus 7 (2013).  The sync seems to get a few songs, but mostly gives errors on music and podcasts.  It seems to work fine as a remote, but there are many free apps for that.  I would not recommend this app.   If it can be fixed I\'ll be happy, otherwise I\'d prefer a refund.  I wish I didn\'t spend all the time trying to get to work.  15 minutes may be too short a window for refunds...
reviews.author: Collin Kenny

reviews.title: Connection problem
reviews.comment: How the hell do you connect it to a pc??????
reviews.author: Chilala Nsanzya

reviews.title: Good...except
reviews.comment: Is there anyway to change the destination folder on my phone to one on the removable sd card?
reviews.author: Tyler Andrus

reviews.title: This App Sucks, No Response from Vendor.
reviews.comment: Got this app and realised that you have to make an in-app purchase to sync playlists. So payed for it. But the dumb thing is not able to stay connected/sync playlists. Either the desktop app crashes or the mobile app gives an error in syncing files with itunes. Wrote to the vendor, who promises a 24 hour response. There has been no revert for over a week now. Shitty app. DO NOT BUY.  Is there a way by which i can claim a refund?
reviews.author: Tejas Gutka

reviews.title: To big no scrowl

reviews.title: Windows only
reviews.comment: There doesn\'t seem to be a version for Mac. I\'m sure there are plenty of Mac owners not using iPhones.
reviews.author: Alan Chalmers

reviews.title: mixed success
reviews.comment: I didn\'t have any problem getting MeloDroid to install on my phone or on Win7 and my phone can control the iTunes on Win7, but no matter what I do I can\'t get QuickSync or USB Sync to actually move any songs onto my phone.  The one user said to clear the phone cache.  I\'ve looked, my Galaxy Prevail does not seem to have users accessible cache settings. I just want a music manager/player for Android that works and is either small or can move to the SD card.  DoubleTwist was nice, but it is too huge.  I only have 161 mb of internal storage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome! I love it!
reviews.comment: I had to spend a little bit of time trying to get it to sync with my computer... But, I checked with the PC program, fiddled with the phone, and i couldn\'t get it to work: but, then I cleared the cache in my phones settings, and viola! It worked like a charm! I have to say I LOVE this app, it works amazingly!
reviews.author: A Google User
